title: V.E. Schwab's ExtraOrdinary #1
description: Expands deeper into the world of Schwab’s critically acclaimed Villains novels. After surviving a deadly crash, Charlotte Tills becomes “ExtraOrdinary”, gaining the ability to foresee a person’s death. But when she looks into her own future, only the face of notorious EO killer Eli Ever stares back!
author: Victoria E. Schwab
